Summary: bright yellow glow with red outer colour much bigger than the stars
divs: Sighting Detailssaw a yellow circle with red around it, which seemed to be not moving, looked very high up, but when looking at the stars (on a very clear night) the object was considerably larger than the stars. It then seemed to move back into the night sky as the red started to disappear and the yellow got smaller until it completely disappeared. This was seen by my myself, my daughter and her friend. There was also a group of youths aged approx. 14yrs upwards who watched it. This is unlike anything I have ever seen before. kind regards lucie mackay
trends: There has been one other sighting in Dundee
There were no other sightings in Dundee on or around December 26th 2009
